CmdLine: wget -q --progress=dot:mega http://downloads.typesafe.com/typesafe-activator/$ACTIVATOR_VERSION/typesafe-activator-$ACTIVATOR_VERSION.zip &&   unzip -qq typesafe-activator-$ACTIVATOR_VERSION.zip &&   mv activator-dist-$ACTIVATOR_VERSION /opt/activator &&   ln -s /opt/activator/bin/activator /usr/local/bin/activator &&   rm -f typesafe-activator-$ACTIVATOR_VERSION.zip
Commands.Name: run
